mapper.update: MERGE INTO ORDER_SHEET o USING DUAL ON (o.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET o.EDCTS_CD = #{edctsCd}, o.VEND_CD = #{vendCd}, o.VEND_NM = #{vendNm}, o.ORDER_DT = #{orderDt}, o.PROG_APPE = #{progAppe}, o.PAPRD_DT = #{paprdDt}, o.PRDT_NM = #{prdtNm}, o.ORDER_CNT = #{orderCnt} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (o.ORDER_NO, o.EDCTS_CD, o.VEND_CD, o.VEND_NM, o.ORDER_DT, o.PROG_APPE, o.PAPRD_DT, o.PRDT_NM, o.ORDER_CNT) VALUES(#{orderNo},#{edctsCd},#{vendCd},#{vendNm},#{orderDt},#{progAppe},#{paprdDt},#{prdtNm},#{orderCnt})
